description: Zero-corpus MVP: FastAPI server with 2 work unit types (verify_finding, decision_chain)

userStories.title: Download JSON exports
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the rhowardstone JSON exports so I can generate work units
acceptanceCriteria: persons_registry.json exists in data/ folder
knowledge_graph_entities.json exists in data/ folder
knowledge_graph_relationships.json exists in data/ folder
efta_dataset_mapping.json exists in data/ folder

userStories.title: EFTA URL builder
userStories.description: As a work unit generator, I need to convert EFTA numbers to DOJ PDF URLs
acceptanceCriteria: Function efta_to_url(efta_number, dataset) returns valid DOJ URL
Handles adjacent dataset fallback for gap ranges
Uses efta_dataset_mapping.json for dataset lookup

userStories.title: Work Unit data models
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Pydantic models for work units and results
acceptanceCriteria: WorkUnit model with unit_id, type, instructions, efta_urls, etc.
VerifyFindingResult model with claim, verdict, evidence, citations
DecisionChainResult model with actors, communications, timeline

userStories.title: Findings SQLite store
userStories.description: As a server, I need to persist submitted findings
acceptanceCriteria: findings.db created with findings and citations tables
store_finding() function saves result with provenance
get_findings() retrieves by unit_type or efta_number
userStories.notes: Simple SQLite, no ORM needed for MVP

userStories.title: Work Unit Generator - verify_finding
userStories.description: As a server, I need to generate verify_finding work units from rhowardstone claims
acceptanceCriteria: Parses claims from rhowardstone reports
Generates work unit with claim text and cited EFTA URLs
Tracks which claims have been assigned/completed
userStories.notes: Linear scaling - one claim per unit

userStories.title: Work Unit Generator - decision_chain
userStories.description: As a server, I need to generate decision_chain work units for NPA correspondence
acceptanceCriteria: Generates batches of 20-50 documents from same time window
Uses persons_registry.json to identify relevant actors
Includes DOJ URLs for all documents in batch

userStories.title: FastAPI endpoints
userStories.description: As a worker, I need API endpoints to claim work and submit results
acceptanceCriteria: GET /work returns next available work unit
POST /result accepts finding submission
GET /status returns project stats

userStories.title: End-to-end test
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to verify the full workflow works
acceptanceCriteria: Can claim a verify_finding unit via API
Can submit a result via API
Result appears in findings.db
GET /status reflects the submission
userStories.notes: Manual test with curl or httpie
